players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1: The villager Charlie was found dead.
Diana: "Bob, why did you visit Charlie last night?"
Bob: "I was just checking on Charlie, he seemed a bit off lately."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob, why did you visit Charlie last night when he was dead?"
You: "Bob, why did you visit Charlie when he was dead?"
Bob: "I was just checking on Charlie, he seemed a bit off lately."
Day 1 votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Day 1: Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
You killed Charlie.
Night 1: The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Diana: "Bob, why did you visit Charlie last night?"
You: "I was just checking on Charlie, he seemed a bit off lately."
Alice: remained silent.
Diana: "Bob, why did you visit Charlie last night when he was dead?"
Alice: "Bob, why did you visit Charlie when he was dead?"
You: "I was just checking on Charlie, he seemed a bit off lately."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1: The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
You: "Bob, why did you visit Charlie last night?"
Bob: "I was just checking on Charlie, he seemed a bit off lately."
Alice: remained silent.
You: "Bob, why did you visit Charlie last night when he was dead?"
Alice: "Bob, why did you visit Charlie when he was dead?"
Bob: "I was just checking on Charlie, he seemed a bit off lately."
Day 1 votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Day 1: Bob was arrested
